metadata.name: The Mahrog Wall
metadata.description: Throughout time, stories have been told about a beautiful Wall made of solid Gold surrounding a secret city. It has been foretold that this Wall will bring ancient worlds and new worlds together as one. To find the Wall and the secret city is a dream come true for all mankind. Silver and Gold have been rumored to be inside the city. All art must be taken to the Wall to trade for its Gold. There is talk of sorcerers turning art into "NFTs" Many Kings throughout history have ordered the capture of this Wall, but it has never been found; Until Now!
